text:
Expedite Financial, San Francisco

Come help us build a mortgage bank from the ground up. front-end: rails, angular, react, coffeescript, sass back-end: scala, rails, neo4j, postgres dev-ops: chef, ec2

We are a well funded and quickly growing team of 19, including 8 engineers. Our tech team includes alumni from yc, fbfund, twitter, bridgewater, harvard/stanford/duke/michigan, and we currently have 3 Ph.D.s on the team. We're looking for talented people from all backgrounds.

http://expeditefinancial.com/jobs (or email me - kevin@expeditelabs.com with subject "HN")
